title: Countly
description:
Meet Countly, the ultimate first-party analytics platform that lets you truly own your product analytics. Designed for businesses that value control and transparency, Countly empowers you to uncover powerful insights, optimize user experiences, and engage customers—all while keeping data secure and private.

With flexible deployment options—in the cloud or on-premises—Countly adapts to your needs, making analytics as unique as your product.

Yes, it’s time to own your product analytics.
